## Outcomes.ruleAndSelectorFilter() function

Filter matching a given rule and CSS selector on the target, or its parent in case of rules targeting an attribute.

**Signature:**

```typescript
function ruleAndSelectorFilter(ruleId: number, selector: string): Predicate<alfaOutcome>;
```

## Remarks

Use to specifically exclude a few occurrences that should not be reported, e.g. to focus the work on more urgent problems.
